context.management_main_invite_desc: Send an invitation to a player to join your gang
context.management_main_managemembers_desc: Promote, demote, or remove gang members
context.management_main_managemembers_desc_count: Promote, demote, or remove gang members (%d total)
context.gangadmin_main_set_desc: Assign or update a player's gang and rank
context.gangadmin_main_remove_desc: Remove a player from their current gang
context.gangadmin_gang_deleterank_desc: Remove a rank from this gang
context.gangadmin_gang_updateranklabel_desc: Change the display name of a rank
context.gangadmin_gang_updaterankranking_desc: Change the hierarchy position of a rank
context.gangadmin_gang_setpasscode_desc: Change the passcode for gang inventory access
context.gangadmin_ranks_manageranks_desc: View, create, edit, and delete ranks
context.gangadmin_ranks_updatelabel_desc: Change the display name of this rank
context.gangadmin_ranks_deleterank_desc: Remove this rank from the gang

alertdialog.gangadmin_gang_delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete **%s**?
alertdialog.gangadmin_rank_delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete "%s"?

inputdialog.management_addmembers_input_description: Enter the player's ID to add to the gang
inputdialog.management_promoteplayer_input_descripti: Enter the rank number to promote the player to
inputdialog.management_demoteplayer_input_descriptio: Enter the rank number to demote the player to
inputdialog.gangadmin_updateranklabel_input_descript: Enter the new display name for this rank
inputdialog.gangadmin_updaterankranking_input_descri: Enter the new hierarchy position (1 = lowest)
inputdialog.gangadmin_gang_input_description: Input the gang name, has to be lowercase
inputdialog.gangadmin_rank_input_description: Enter the rank number to assign

notifications.no_permission: You do not have the required permission to perform this action
notifications.player_not_online: The specified player is not currently online. Action cannot be performed
notifications.player_already_in_gang: The specified player is already a member of a gang
notifications.player_outstanding_invite: The specified player has a pending invite. Please ask them to accept or decline it
notifications.player_invited: The player has been successfully invited
notifications.client_invited_accepted: You have successfully joined the gang: %s
notifications.client_invited_declined: You have declined the pending gang invitation
notifications.client_invited: You have been invited to join the gang: %s. Use /acceptinvite %s to join
notifications.client_noinvites: You have no pending invitations from %s
notifications.gang_exists: A gang with this name already exists
notifications.gang_not_exists: The specified gang was not found
notifications.gang_rank_exists: A gang rank with this name already exists
notifications.gang_rank_not_exists: The specified gang rank was not found
notifications.gang_no_ranks: This gang currently has no ranks defined, or some ranks are missing
notifications.invalid_gang_name: Invalid gang name. Gang names must start with a letter and use only letters and numbers
notifications.invalid_passcode: Invalid passcode. Passcodes must be exactly 4 digits
notifications.invalid_rank: The rank you specified is invalid for the given gang
notifications.invalid_rank_name: Invalid rank name. Rank names must start with a letter and use only letters and numbers
notifications.rank_label_exists: A rank with this label already exists in the gang
notifications.current_gang: You are currently a member of the gang: %s
notifications.not_in_gang: You are not a member of any gang
notifications.client_promoted: You have been promoted within your gang
notifications.client_demoted: You have been demoted within your gang
notifications.no_inventory_access: You do not have access to this gang inventory
